Title: The Price of Fame
Plot: Dalziel is investigating the disapperance of a teenage girl who was addicted to the Internet. He gets rough with the only suspect they have and gets booted off the case.   Then a girl gets murdered at a holiday resort. Not any girl - a popular girl who won a TV reality contest.   Then one of the holiday makers turns up dead as well.
